resources.string: In this activity all the available songs stored in the user\'s device will be displayed. Once the user clicks a song he will be transfered to the now playing activity. MediaPlayer class can be used to implement the play music functionality.

In this activity all the albums that correspond to songs stored in the user\'s device will be displayed. Once the user clicks an album he will be transfered to an activity titled as the selected album showing which songs belong to the selected album.

In this activity all the artists that correspond to songs stored in the user\'s device will be displayed along with their total number of songs. Once the user clicks an artist he will be transfered to an activity titled as the selected artist showing which songs correspond to the selected artist.

In this activity all the genres that correspond to songs stored in the user\'s device will be displayed. Once the user clicks a genre he will be transfered to an activity titled as the selected genre showing which songs correspond to the selected genre.
